messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]  Slicing bread ( was Safety rules..)
messages.msgSnippet: A bread knife is just one giant serrated knife. Good also for slicing tomatoes. On Monday, May 26, 2003, at 16:14 America/New_York, AimeeL73@cs.com ...
messages.messageBody:
A bread knife is just one giant serrated knife. Good also for slicing
tomatoes.


On Monday, May 26, 2003, at 16:14 America/New_York, AimeeL73@...
wrote:

> LOWRIEK@... writes:
>
> << Sandra, you are my husband's dream woman, I cut horrible doorstops
> with
> the
> bread, and he never misses an opportunity to tell me about  it.
> Nancy, never slices bread in BC >>
>
> Use an electric knife and put the bread on it's side.  No more
> doorstops. 
>
> ~Aimee
>
<image.tiff>
>
>

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]  Slicing bread ( was Safety rules..)
messages.messageBody:
LOWRIEK@... writes:

<< Sandra, you are my husband's dream woman, I cut horrible doorstops with
the
bread, and he never misses an opportunity to tell me about it.
Nancy, never slices bread in BC >>

Use an electric knife and put the bread on it's side. No more doorstops.

~Aimee
